channel.title: Looking for a anarchist/leftist RPG group
channel.description: Hi! I'm Scrungus, Someone from reddit told me to go here to meet people for a group. I'm looking to play with Likeminded lefties. Thanks! I have 3 years experience with pathfinder 3.5e and some experience with 5th edition. Hope to meet you soon!

item.title: Looking for a anarchist/leftist RPG group
item.dc:creator: @Sandy
item.description:
@Sandy wrote:

Hi! Games here aren’t explicitly political in that way, but you’ll find a lot of players here with leftist views. Check out the Gauntlet Calendar subforum for games you could join?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a anarchist/leftist RPG group
